Magnus Artifex by KingBoolean

Server-side

Majority of my server-side programming experience consist of Java's Springframework and Javascript's Node.js. Usually with the intent to build Restful Api's, using NoSQL and SQL databases.

Client-side

My client-side experience consist of hand coding static and dynamic sites using HTML, CSS and vanilla Javascript. I have also built applications using Javascript frameworks such as React, Next and Gatsby. Along with experience using CMS platforms like Shopify, WordPress, Woocommerce and Wix

Recent Projects

UX/UI driven

Everything I create is driven by my passion to continuously learn new technologies and methods in order to enhance the users experience. The way I achieve this is to consistently read articles, listen to podcast, take online courses and constantly communicate with Sr developers.

"Always be testing"

My Industrial experience has taught me the importance of constant testing. As a Chemical reactor operator, it is imperative that production and testing was done concurrently. Not only for safety measures but also to ensure the quality of the product. So TDD was a simple concept for me to grasp, while learning Java(Simple not easy).

Collaberative Experience

As a developer today, it is important that you can work in a productive fashion within a diverse team. Not only have I developed with individuals from every walk of life, I have done so in an Agile and Scrum enviroment. I'm currently working with a team to build an application for Fedex contractors. We are currently working in 7 day Sprints.
